0.name: Alfred
0.text: Laura remembered her song, and began to sing once more.

3.name: Alfred
3.text: I heard that a long time ago, the canaries of this village didn't sing.

4.name: Alfred
4.text: Well, that was until a man with an ocarina showed up, and started playing a lullaby to the canaries of this village.

5.name: Alfred
5.text: There was also a woman who let her singing pet canaries loose in the village.

6.name: Alfred
6.text: Together, they managed to turn this quiet village into a lively one.
